translation.en: Leave them so far behind that…
that it's like you never met?

translation.it: - Forse dovresti farne un altro. - Sam.

translation.en: Look, G, I just want you to know that I support you in whatever decision you want to make.
translation.it: Ascolta, G, sappi solo che ti sosterrò qualunque decisione tu prenda.

translation.en: I know you're trying to be sweet right now
translation.it: So che cerchi solo di essere dolce

translation.en: and that you're worried about me.
translation.it: e che sei preoccupato per me…

translation.en: Let's do it. I'm serious. Let's get married.
They're here. I don't wanna make them wait.
translation.it: Sono arrivati. Non voglio farli aspettare.

translation.en: [woman 2] I want you to order a self-drive on the way home. -Don't let anyone drive you. Okay? -[woman] Okay.
translation.it: Noleggia un'auto per tornare a casa. Non accettare passaggi, ok?

translation.en: [woman 2] Sam, you're backing me up on this, right?
translation.it: Sam, sei d'accordo con me, vero?

translation.en: Yes, Mr. and Mrs. Olsen, I got you.
Whose parents are gonna be there? No one's parents, Dad. We're in college.
translation.it: - Quali genitori ci saranno? - Nessuno, papà. Siamo al college.
Stai bene? Non sembri in forma.

translation.en: -You look a little green around the gills. -I'm fine, Mom. I'm just…
translation.it: Stai bene? Non sembri in forma. Sto bene, mamma. Non…

translation.en: -Can I have my coat, please, Eli? -[Eli] Yes, ma'am.
translation.it: - Mi dai il cappotto, Eli? - Sì, signora.

translation.en: It's mine. And I want it back.
[woman] Uh, my purse too. Thank you.
[Mr. Olsen] Have fun, you two. Be safe.
Yes, sir, we won't be out too long. Good night, Mrs. Olsen.
translation.it: Sì. Non faremo tardi. Buonanotte, sig.ra Olsen.

translation.en: [announcer on TV] Since 1969, Raster Robotics has delivered cutting-edge AI…
translation.it: Dal 1969, la Raster Robotics crea per voi intelligenze artificiali all'avanguardia…

translation.en: -Hold up. Does this have rum in it? -Uh, it does not, sir.
translation.it: - Aspetta. C'è rum qui? - No, signore.

translation.en: I'm sorry, your parents put a restriction on shots served.
translation.it: Mi spiace, i suoi hanno messo una restrizione.

translation.en: -Do you have my phone? I can't find it. -No, I don't. Did you leave it?
translation.it: Hai il mio telefono? Non lo trovo. No. L'hai perso?

translation.en: Fuck. Did I not give it to you?
translation.it: Cazzo, non l'ho dato a te?

translation.en: -Let me take that for you, G. -What?
translation.it: - Lo prendo io, G. - Che cosa?

translation.en: Yo, are you two fighting? You seem like you're fighting.
translation.it: - State litigando? Sembrerebbe. - È tutto ok.
- State litigando? Sembrerebbe. - È tutto ok. - Non chiedevo a te, Samuel. - Mi metti in imbarazzo.
- Non chiedevo a te, Samuel. - Mi metti in imbarazzo.
…per un'evoluzione dei vostri androidi senza pari…

translation.en: [announcer] Get the new OS this Christmas from Raster Robotics.
translation.it: Comprate il nuovo sistema operativo della Raster Robotics questo Natale.

translation.en: [man 1] Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch the elbows.
I've got it, sir. Not to worry. [man 1] Is this the first time you ever played, huh?
translation.it: - Ci penso io, signore. - È la prima volta che ci giochi?

translation.en: He's trying to be so sweet.
And… I'm not ready for this.
I'm not even sure that I wanna be with him.
translation.it: Non so neanche se voglio lui.

translation.en: That's why he's being so fucking dumb right now.
translation.it: È per questo che si comporta da idiota.

translation.en: [woman 3] So what are you gonna do?
No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!
Go! Go to the front door! Go--
[Sam] G, go back! Go back! Go back!
They're not supposed to be able to do that.
They're programmed not to be able to do that.
-[woman 3] I've got to call my mom. -[Sam] Shit!
translation.it: - Devo chiamare mia madre. - Porca troia!

translation.en: [Sam] You said you wanted something to do with nature.
translation.it: Volevi un nome legato alla natura.

translation.en: [Georgia] Uh, yeah, sure. But I meant…
I don't know, something like… [inhales sharply]
[Sam] Right. Because River is so much better than Leaf.
translation.it: Certo, perché Fiume è molto meglio di Foglia.

translation.en: [Georgia] All right, forget nature. What's your first choice for a girl?
translation.it: Dimentica la natura. La tua prima scelta per una bambina?

translation.en: How are you so sure that this is a baby girl?
translation.it: Come fai a essere così sicura che sia femmina?

translation.en: I don't know. I can tell.
I'm telling you it's a boy.

translation.it: - No, non lo è. - Invece sì.
Ho sognato che è una bambina.

translation.en: Yeah, you also had a dream you gave birth to a pony.
translation.it: Sì, hai sognato anche di partorire un pony.

translation.en: -No, I didn't. -You having a pony too?
-No, I didn't. When? -Oh my God. Yes, you did.
translation.it: Non è vero. - Oddio. Sì, invece! - Quando?

translation.en: You told me you were gonna break up with me when I said we can ride that pony.
translation.it: Hai minacciato di lasciarmi quando ho proposto di cavalcarlo.

translation.en: -I think it's just an animal. -[Georgia] Come on.

translation.it: E lei non smette di scalciare.

translation.en: Come on, babe, we got to get going.

translation.it: Sì, mi fanno male i piedi.

translation.en: Keep telling you, you need to get the All Stars.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto, dovevi comprarti le All Stars.

translation.en: [Georgia] We've gotta clear six miles by sundown.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare dieci km prima di sera.

translation.en: As long as we stay away from the road, I think we'll be okay.
I'm always afraid they're gonna shoot us.
translation.it: Ho sempre paura che ci sparino.

translation.en: Just do what they say. Move slowly.
translation.it: Fai quello che dicono. Muoviti lentamente.

translation.en: Put your packs down and turn around.
translation.it: Mettete giù gli zaini e giratevi.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, we have a machete and a revolver.
translation.it: Sì, abbiamo un machete e una rivoltella.

translation.en: What's the girl hiding under her shirt?
translation.it: Cos'ha la ragazza sotto la camicia?

translation.en: One at a time. You, go ahead.
translation.it: Uno alla volta. Tu vai. Tu stai fermo.

translation.en: Put your palm up against this fence.
Put your palm up on the fence.
No. No, no, no, you're over there.
[woman] Where are you guys coming from?
[Georgia] After the Blitz, we thought things would just get better.
translation.it: Dopo il blitz, speravamo in un assestamento.

translation.en: We waited out for a few months, and then we tried to get to New York.
translation.it: Abbiamo aspettato qualche mese e poi cercato di andare a New York.

translation.en: And then, on our way to New York, they detonated the electronic pulse thing.
translation.it: Ma nel frattempo hanno fatto esplodere quell'impulso elettronico.

translation.en: Yeah. Grunt freaked out and triggered it during an attack.
translation.it: Sì. Grant è impazzito e l'ha innescato durante un attacco.

translation.en: Once the EMP blast radius went down,
the next wave of androids swarmed the soldiers and…
translation.it: altri androidi hanno attaccato i soldati e…

translation.en: Well, that was the end of New York City.
translation.it: Beh, quella è stata la fine per New York.

translation.en: [Georgia] We ended up looping back up the long way. And now we're… [sighs] …trying to get to Boston.
translation.it: Siamo tornati facendo una strada più lunga e ora cerchiamo di andare a Boston.

translation.en: [woman] Boston is fortified, but you can't get straight there.
translation.it: Boston è fortificata, ma non è facile andarci.

translation.en: [woman] The area surrounding it is no-man's-land.
translation.it: La zona intorno è terra di nessuno.

translation.en: Gonna be tough unless you can figure out a way to come in from the sea.
translation.it: Sarà dura a meno che non proviate via mare.

translation.en: I wouldn't risk it while you're this far along.
[Georgia] Oh, um, I… I can ask you.
Uh, when I give birth, I know that I have to cut the umbilical cord.
translation.it: So che dovrò tagliare il cordone ombelicale.

translation.en: I read it that I have to.
How do I get it out of me? Is it just gonna fall out or--
[woman] You can have the baby here.
[woman] I mean, you're past due. You really shouldn't be traveling at all.
translation.it: Sei già oltre il termine. Non dovresti proprio viaggiare.

translation.en: [Georgia] Sam wants us to get to Boston before I give birth.
translation.it: Sam vuole che arriviamo a Boston prima che partorisca.

translation.en: We're trying to get to this.
Families with a child one year or younger,
translation.it: Le famiglie con figli di un anno o meno potrebbero prendere

translation.en: they qualify to take a boat somewhere safe.
translation.it: Le famiglie con figli di un anno o meno potrebbero prendere una barca per un posto sicuro, forse in Asia.
una barca per un posto sicuro, forse in Asia.

translation.en: Have you heard anything about it?
Yeah. Um, couple of months ago, this is what everyone was doing.
translation.it: Sì, un paio di mesi fa facevano tutti così.

translation.en: In the spring. Why? Did you hear something?
I can ask around for you,
but I heard they were only taking the mothers and babies.
translation.it: ma ho sentito che prendevano solo le madri e i bambini.
Per una questione di scorte di cibo.

translation.en: [Sam] Yo, what's up, man? Can I get one of those?
translation.it: Ehi, come va, bello? Posso averne una?

translation.en: You, uh, you know if they got any shipments going to Boston? Anyone I can hitch a ride with?
translation.it: Sai se hanno dei carichi diretti a Boston? Qualcuno a cui chiedere un passaggio?

translation.en: My girl's pregnant, and we're trying to cut through the no-man's-land.
translation.it: La mia ragazza è incinta. Dobbiamo passare la terra di nessuno.

translation.en: No one's getting through no-man's-land. That's why it's called no-man's-land.
translation.it: Nessuno la attraversa. Perciò si chiama terra di nessuno.

translation.en: Yeah. I just mean, maybe there's a way for us to get to Boston.
They got a strong holdout because of the troops and the EMPs. But all it takes is one domino.
translation.it: Hanno una roccaforte con truppe e EMP, ma potrebbe innescarsi un effetto domino.

translation.en: You can only detonate it once. Takes out everything with an electrical current within its blast radius.
translation.it: Puoi farlo esplodere solo una volta. Distrugge tutto nel suo raggio d'azione.

translation.en: Then all we got is guns.

translation.it: Ma è ciò che vogliono gli androidi.

translation.en: Get us to blow an EMP
so they can get up nice and close.
You, uh, you know if they still shipping people out?
You trying to hop over to China?
Yeah. I bet they still have boats.
translation.it: Sì, scommetto che hanno ancora delle barche.

translation.en: I'm not trying to run from this.
[man] Please, I told you I had a hip replacement. Listen to me!
translation.it: Ho una protesi all'anca, le ho detto! Mi ascolti!

translation.en: [man 2] I don't know about no hip replacement.
translation.it: Io so solo che il rilevatore continua ad accendersi.

translation.en: All I know is you light up my detector. Now step back!
translation.it: Io so solo che il rilevatore continua ad accendersi. Si allontani!

translation.en: [man] Please! You wanna cut me open? You wanna see? I bleed red just like you.
translation.it: La prego! Vuole squartarmi? Vuole vedere? Sanguino come lei!

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, you got metal in your bones. -You got five seconds to back off! -[man] Please.
translation.it: Ha del metallo nelle ossa. Ha cinque secondi!

translation.en: -[man 2] Five! Get off the fence! Three! -[man] No, please. They said they--
translation.it: - La prego! - Cinque! Si allontani! Tre. Per favore, hanno detto…

translation.en: [Georgia] The doctor hasn't heard anything about the Family Initiative for weeks.
translation.it: La dottoressa non sa niente del Progetto Famiglie da settimane.

translation.en: [Sam] I talked to a soldier. He said they still got boats going out of Boston.
translation.it: Un soldato dice che da Boston partono ancora barche.

translation.en: Why would they still have boats if they're not taking families?
translation.it: Perché partirebbero se non prendono le famiglie?

translation.en: We got days of walking left, and we gotta get through no-man's-land without being noticed.
translation.it: Dobbiamo camminare giorni e attraversare la terra di nessuno senza farci notare.

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy with Baby Boy with us.
translation.it: Non sarà facile con un bambino.

translation.en: If you can find a safe way for us to go,
translation.it: Se trovi un modo sicuro per viaggiare,

translation.en: the soldiers can give us a ride or something…
Fuck. I wish we still had the Internet.

translation.it: Un paio di calzini puliti e abbinati.

translation.en: What if they only take one of us?
translation.it: E se prendessero solo uno di noi?

translation.en: only taking the mothers and the babies.
translation.it: prendono solo le madri e i bambini.

translation.en: She said they might not take you.
I mean, I… I guess… I guess you and the baby get on the boat, and I'll…
translation.it: Allora immagino che tu e il bambino salirete sulla barca e io…

translation.en: I'll just figure something else out, G.
Wait, what? That's not what I wanna hear.
translation.it: - Aspetta, cosa? - Non è quello che volevo sentire.

translation.en: I wanna hear that we're in this together.
That's what I thought that we were doing. -That-- -It is what we're doing.
translation.it: - È ciò che pensavo stessimo facendo. - È così.

translation.en: That we could have just gotten rid of this, but we didn't.
translation.it: Potevamo sbarazzarcene e non l'abbiamo fatto.

translation.en: And this baby's on its way, Sam.
translation.it: E il bambino sta per arrivare, Sam.

translation.en: You're trying to put me on a boat by myself so I'm not your responsibility.
translation.it: Vuoi mettermi su una barca da sola senza prenderti responsabilità.

translation.en: You asked me what I thought.
You're throwing a bunch of what-ifs at me. I'm trying to do the right thing.
translation.it: Hai fatto ipotesi. Voglio fare la cosa giusta.

translation.en: What part of putting me on a boat by myself
translation.it: Quale parte del mettermi su una barca da sola

translation.en: You're being very hormonal right now.
I am allowed to have emotions! This is not me being hormonal!
translation.it: Ho il diritto di provare emozioni. Non sono gli ormoni!

translation.en: I should have just broken up with you.
-I'm gonna go get us a ride. -[door zipping]
Don't worry. I'm not abandoning you or whatever.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Non ti sto abbandonando.

translation.en: [man] We got a special treat for you tonight.
This is no android right here.
I know it looks too good to be true.
translation.it: Sembra troppo bello per essere vero.

translation.en: This is 100% USDA prime beef right here.
translation.it: Solo manzo di prima qualità al 100%.

translation.en: [Sam] Yo, man, how can I get a ride to Boston?
translation.it: Ehi, come trovo un passaggio per Boston?

translation.en: You could fight me for it.
[man 2] Convoy's going up to Nashua tomorrow.
translation.it: Il convoglio andrà a Nashua domani.

translation.en: It'd get you just about as close as anyone can get.
translation.it: Ti porterebbe il più vicino possibile.

translation.en: Yeah. All you gotta do is…
All you gotta do is put me flat on my back,
and you got yourself a ride.
What's it gonna be, little man?

translation.it: Regole della casa. Non ci sono regole.

translation.en: And you rock till you drop.
Can you come out here, please?
[Georgia] Sam. What the fuck did you do to him?
translation.it: Sam! Che cazzo gli avete fatto?

translation.en: He was fighting with a patrol officer last night.
translation.it: Ha lottato con un agente ieri sera.

translation.en: [man] I got a man with a busted skull who's blind in one eye.
translation.it: Gli ha rotto il cranio e accecato un occhio.

translation.en: No. No, I… I'm sorry, but that… that can't be what happened.
translation.it: No, mi dispiace, ma… Non è possibile.

translation.en: [man] I can account for a certain amount of rowdiness among the soldiers,
translation.it: Posso accettare un po' di chiasso tra i soldati,

translation.en: but I will not tolerate a guest on my base whaling on my boys.
translation.it: ma non tollero che nella mia base un ospite attacchi uno dei miei ragazzi.

translation.en: What are you… what are you going to do to him?
Lady, I'm fighting a fucking war here against an enemy that literally never sleeps,
translation.it: Sto combattendo una cazzo di guerra contro un nemico che non dorme mai

translation.en: whose main objective is to wipe us off the face of the earth.
translation.it: e che vuole spazzarci via dalla faccia della Terra.

translation.en: We've got half a platoon, most of them barely trained.
translation.it: Ho mezzo plotone. Molti sono a malapena addestrati.

translation.en: And I do not need a couple of kids too chickenshit to enlist,
translation.it: Non mi servono due ragazzini troppo codardi per arruolarsi che li mettano fuori uso.

translation.en: putting any of them out of commission.
translation.it: troppo codardi per arruolarsi che li mettano fuori uso.

translation.en: You're no longer welcome on this base.
Sir, I don't think you understand. I have permission from Dr. Howe--
translation.it: Signore, non credo che lei capisca. Ho il permesso della dott.ssa Howe.

translation.en: -[slams fist] -Yes, I've spoken to Dr. Howe.
You got two minutes to get off my fucking base.
translation.it: Avete due minuti per levarvi dal cazzo.

translation.en: before I signal the other outposts and tell them not to let you in.
translation.it: o vi bloccherò l'accesso agli altri avamposti.

translation.en: -[Sam] Come on, man! Come on! -[soldier 1] Let's go. Keep moving.
[Dr. Howe] Some painkillers. Some hydrogen peroxide. And medical gloves for him.
translation.it: Antidolorifici, acqua ossigenata, guanti medici per lui.

translation.en: [soldier 1] Get back! I got a machete and a revolver in there.
translation.it: - Indietro! - Ho un machete e una rivoltella là.

translation.en: I wish I could do more, but it's all I can spare.
translation.it: Purtroppo non posso fare di più.

translation.en: Cut the umbilical cord close to your baby and tie it off.
translation.it: Taglia il cordone vicino al bambino e fai un nodo.

translation.en: The part connected to you will expel itself an hour after you give birth.
translation.it: La parte legata a te verrà espulsa un'ora dopo.

translation.en: Hey, women have been giving birth
since way before people started calling themselves doctors.
translation.it: da prima che esistessero i medici.

translation.en: [Sam] Ma'am, please. I had a revolver as well. I came--
translation.it: - Avevo anche una rivoltella. - Non ne so niente.

translation.en: -[soldier 2] I don't know about it. -I got a baby on the way.
translation.it: - Avevo anche una rivoltella. - Non ne so niente. La mia ragazza è incinta, per favore.
La mia ragazza è incinta, per favore.

translation.en: Look, there are androids out there, and it's just us. Please.
translation.it: Ci sono androidi là fuori e siamo soli. Per favore.

translation.en: Look, G, I'm sorry that I was--
translation.it: Ascolta, G, mi dispiace di aver…

translation.en: G, I was trying to get us a ride so that we could go to Boston.
translation.it: Stavo cercando un passaggio per andare a Boston.

translation.en: You don't think I can protect you, but I can.
translation.it: Non ci credi, ma posso proteggerti.

translation.en: You asshole. You dumb asshole! Asshole! You fucking asshole!
translation.it: Stronzo! Sei un pezzo di merda!

translation.en: [Sam] When the rain dies down, I'll try to start a fire.
translation.it: Quando smette, provo a fare un fuoco.

translation.en: -What's going on, baby? Is it time? -No.
translation.it: Che succede, tesoro? È ora? No.

translation.en: Look, G, I didn't find a towel, but--
We are not having sex tonight, so don't you dare look at me.
translation.it: Non faremo sesso stanotte, non osare guardarmi.

translation.en: I'm still so mad at you for being so dumb.
translation.it: Non ti ho perdonato la fesseria.

translation.en: -It was so fucking dumb, Sam. -I know. I know.
translation.it: - Una gran fesseria del cazzo, Sam. - Lo so.

translation.en: I'm sorry for saying what I said.
I don't know. I was just being…
Ugh! Please tell me there's a mattress somewhere in this house I can sleep on.
translation.it: Oh, ti prego, dimmi che in questa casa c'è un materasso su cui posso dormire.

translation.en: My spine feels like it's gonna shatter.
translation.it: La mia colonna vertebrale è a pezzi.

translation.en: -Do you want me to help you? -[muffled] Take this.
This camera has one more photo in it,
translation.it: Questa macchina fotografica ha ancora uno scatto,

translation.en: can have an actual real-life family photo.
translation.it: potremo avere una vera foto di famiglia.

translation.en: We are not naming our baby Spruce.
Everything we've heard about Boston is that it's surrounded.
translation.it: Su Boston abbiamo solo sentito che è circondata.

translation.en: [sighs] So we'd have to go up north.
[sighs] And then we'd have to find a boat or something to bring us back down into Boston Harbor.
translation.it: Poi dovremo trovare una barca o qualcosa per tornare al porto di Boston.

translation.en: And there's the boat stuff, which…
I don't know how to figure that out.
And how long to cut straight through?
We would have to be silent.
We should have the baby here.
We make such a big deal about giving birth, but…
translation.it: Ne facciamo un affare di Stato, ma…

translation.en: women used to give birth and then,
I don't know, cut the umbilical cord with their teeth and keep on hunting.
translation.it: tagliavano il cordone ombelicale coi denti e tornavano a caccia.

translation.en: Oh, what, so you're a hunter now?
Once the baby's here, we could just take our time.
translation.it: Quando nascerà, potremo rallentare un po'.

translation.en: Take the long way. It's dry here. We have supplies.
translation.it: Fare la strada più lunga. Qui il clima è secco. Abbiamo provviste.

translation.en: We've been lugging that medical dictionary around for six months now.
translation.it: Ci portiamo dietro quel dizionario medico da sei mesi.

translation.en: Think it'll ever go back to normal?
translation.it: Pensi che tornerà mai come prima?

translation.en: I mean, I don't even know if it should.
But I do think it could be good still.
translation.it: Ma credo che potrebbe essere ancora bello.

translation.en: I got it to turn over a second ago.
translation.it: L'ho messa in moto un secondo fa.

translation.en: Take it you saw the mass grave, huh?
Yeah, but why? We can't take it.
translation.it: Sì, ma perché? Non possiamo prenderla.

translation.en: 'Cause it will attract too much attention.
We'll just go on foot once the baby's here.
translation.it: - Andremo a piedi col bambino. - Ascolta, G.

translation.en: Look, G, I know you're not gonna like this,
translation.it: - Andremo a piedi col bambino. - Ascolta, G. So che non ti piacerà,

translation.en: but I need you to hear me out.
You could have this baby today or in a week.
translation.it: Potresti partorire oggi o tra una settimana.

translation.en: And I don't feel good about waiting on the edge of no-man's-land,
translation.it: Non voglio stare vicino alla terra di nessuno

translation.en: And if we take this bike, we can get there by the end of the day.
translation.it: Con la moto, potremmo arrivare entro fine giornata.

translation.en: What… happened to going quietly, Sam?
translation.it: Che ne è stato del fare piano, Sam?

translation.en: Let's say you have the baby,
and we pull off the home birth by ourselves.
translation.it: e ci occupiamo del parto da soli.
Avremo un bambino che urlerà quando avrà fame

translation.en: who screams when he's hungry or when it's cold.
translation.it: Avremo un bambino che urlerà quando avrà fame o freddo.

translation.en: We've been sneaking around so far, but we're not gonna be able to do that anymore.
translation.it: Finora abbiamo proseguito furtivamente, ma non potremo farlo più.

translation.en: Let's say we can stay quiet enough to make it up to New Hampshire.
translation.it: Diciamo che riusciamo a raggiungere il New Hampshire.

translation.en: What kind of boat are we gonna get? A motorboat?

translation.it: O una a gas? O una barca a vela?

translation.en: I don't know how to sail, G. Do you?
translation.it: Io non so navigare, G. E tu?

translation.en: I see a way that we can do this.
A way to make it okay.
G, I know you think I can't protect you, but I would kill for you.
translation.it: Pensi che non sappia proteggerti, ma ucciderei per te.

translation.en: And I would do the same for our baby.

translation.it: Quindi, ti prego, G, per favore,

translation.en: Let me just fix this bike
so we can get the hell out of this dumb situation.
Mmm-hmm. Bet you want some All Stars now, don't you?
translation.it: Ora vorresti le All Stars, eh?

translation.en: Get your shit, G. Let's go.
translation.it: Prendi le tue cose, G. Andiamo.

translation.en: -G, did we lose him? -I think we lost him.
-[Sam] Fuck, G! -Come on. Go! Don't slow down!
-I'll distract them with the gun. Listen. -Sam!
translation.it: - Dammi la pistola! Li distraggo! - Sam! Ascolta! È l'unico modo. Inseguono me e tu scappi.

translation.en: This is the only shot. If they chase me, you can get away.
translation.it: Ascolta! È l'unico modo. Inseguono me e tu scappi.
- No. - Ci vediamo al fiume. Ce la farò.

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. I can outrun them. -Sam!
translation.it: - No. - Ci vediamo al fiume. Ce la farò. Sam!

translation.en: If you don't want them to catch you, come with me now.
translation.it: Se non vuoi farti beccare, seguimi.

translation.en: I can help you, but you have to come with me.
Is it safe to speak here?
How have they not found this place?
You ever hear of Karel Čapek?
And what does that have to do with anything?
In it, a man, scientist, tries to create new life.
translation.it: Nell'opera, un uomo, uno scienziato, cerca di ricreare la vita

translation.en: Prove that there was no God.
were these artificial creatures with living flesh and blood components.
translation.it: erano creature artificiali con carne e sangue organici.

translation.en: Essentially what the modern android is.
They look like us. They talk like us.
translation.it: Assomigliano a noi. Parlano come noi.

translation.en: And it's commonplace to mistake a Roboti for a human.
translation.it: Ed è facile che vengano scambiati per esseri umani.

translation.en: And at first, they seem happy to serve man.
translation.it: All'inizio, sembrano felici di servire gli uomini,

translation.en: a Roboti rebellion leads to the extinction of human life.
translation.it: si ribellano estinguendo la vita umana.

translation.en: This play introduced the word "robot" to human language,
translation.it: Questa opera ha introdotto la parola "robot" nel linguaggio umano.

translation.en: and it ends with our extinction.
We knew what was coming the second we gave it a name.
translation.it: Sapevamo le conseguenze fin dal principio.

translation.en: But sure, let's build million-dollar butlers
translation.it: Ma costruiamo un maggiordomo da un milione di dollari

translation.en: and assume it's all going to be okay.
translation.it: e pensiamo che andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: I'm alive because I know how they think.
translation.it: Sono vivo perché so come pensano.

translation.en: What happened that night, the night of the Blitz?
translation.it: Cos'è successo quella notte? La notte del blitz.

translation.en: They were supposed to be programmed not to kill us.
translation.it: Erano stati programmati per non ucciderci.

translation.en: What went wrong was we built them in the first place.
translation.it: Il fatto stesso di averli costruiti.
Ti si sono rotte le acque?

translation.en: You need to forget about your friend.
I'm sorry for what you're going through.
But you need to get with the program here.
And they've jumped the evolutionary chain.
translation.it: E hanno saltato la catena evolutiva.

translation.en: They've hacked our programming, and they'll use it against us until we're all dead.
translation.it: Hanno hackerato i nostri codici per sterminarci.

translation.en: "Hacked our programming." What do you mean?
translation.it: "Hackerato i nostri codici?" Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: We're not robots. You can't hack us.
translation.it: Noi non siamo robot. Non possono hackerarci.

translation.en: I know it sounds dumb, but that's what it is.
translation.it: So che sembra stupido, ma è così.

translation.en: Human beings are programmed through hormones and primal urges
translation.it: Gli esseri umani sono programmati con gli ormoni e gli istinti primordiali

translation.en: to have emotional connections. It's what kept us alive this long.
translation.it: per avere legami affettivi. È ciò che ci tiene in vita così a lungo.

translation.en: But an android doesn't have that.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.it: Non hanno spirito di autoconservazione e sacrificano se stessi

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.it: e gli altri per avvicinarsi al loro obiettivo.

translation.en: They can reason past sentiment and emotional bond.
translation.it: Possono ragionare su sentimenti passati e legami affettivi.

translation.en: I can't leave him to die.
They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
Why do you care so much?
-[Arthur] They're all dead. -I know. -They're all dead. -I know.
You were headed to Boston, right?
I can get you there. I can get you there safe.
About eight years ago, we started developing camouflage algorithms
translation.it: Otto anni fa, creammo algoritmi di mimetizzazione

translation.en: for our complex in Eastern Europe.
translation.it: per i conflitti in Europa orientale.

translation.en: Androids see UV, heat sensors, night vision.
translation.it: Gli androidi vedono i raggi UV, i sensori termici, hanno la visione notturna.

translation.en: But this algorithm created a mask against all of that.
translation.it: Ma questo algoritmo ha creato uno schermo contro tutto ciò.

translation.en: -[Georgia] That makes you invisible? -To the eye.
But they can hear you. They can smell you. They're not stupid.
translation.it: Ma possono sentirti. Possono fiutarti. Non sono stupidi. Conoscono la tecnologia e la cercano.

translation.en: They know this tech exists, so they look for it.
translation.it: Non sono stupidi. Conoscono la tecnologia e la cercano.

translation.en: But it gives us a shot.

translation.it: Non me ne vado senza Sam.

translation.en: camouflage or whatever you wanna call it,
translation.it: Questa mimetizzazione o come si chiama,

translation.en: it gives me a chance to go and get him.
translation.it: mi dà la possibilità di andare a prenderlo.

translation.en: I'm not letting you take my armor for that.
It doesn't matter. Either way, I'm gonna go get him.
I really did try to help you.

translation.it: Dio, no! Per favore, mio Dio, no!

translation.en: What are they doing to them?

translation.it: Li usano come esche. Per chi?

translation.en: He won't be the only one they've captured.
translation.it: Non sarà l'unico che hanno catturato.

translation.en: You'll need one for him if you wanna get him out of there.
translation.it: Uno servirà a lui, se vuoi salvarlo.

translation.en: Are you sure this thing works?
You find him, and you put this on him.
Get him out of there, and you do it silently.
They're gonna notice he's disappeared. You have four miles till you get to the edge of no-man's-land.
translation.it: Si accorgeranno che sarà scomparso. Sei a 6,5 km dalla terra di nessuno.

translation.en: They won't stop until they detect the EMP radius signal. Understand?
translation.it: Non smetteranno finché non rileveranno il segnale del raggio EMP. Chiaro?

translation.en: Or you could just walk away.
You could walk away right now.
[man] Let me out! Let me out!
-What did they do to you? -G, get out of here.
translation.it: Cosa ti hanno fatto? - G, vattene da qui. - Ehi.

translation.en: -[chain clinks] -[man] Hey! -Shh. -[man] Please help me out.
You don't understand. You don't understand. They're right there. Please. Be quiet.
translation.it: Ti prego, devi capirlo. Sono proprio qui. Per favore.

translation.en: Stop it. Be quiet. Please be quiet.
translation.it: - Mi aiuti? - Smettila! Ti prego, fai silenzio!

translation.en: -Be quiet. -I can help you. -I can help you. Let me out. -Wait. Stop. Please be quiet. Please.
translation.it: - Zitto! Ti prego, fai silenzio. - Posso aiutarvi. Ti prego, fammi uscire.

translation.en: Hey, come here, you fucking piece of shit!
translation.it: Ehi, vieni qui, pezzo di merda.

translation.en: Hey! Hey, come on. Just help me out.
If you don't fucking help me, I'm gonna scream.
translation.it: Se non mi aiuti, cazzo, mi metterò a urlare

translation.en: And every single one of those motherfuckers is gonna come in here.
translation.it: e tutti quei figli di puttana verranno qui dentro!

translation.en: Hey! Get me out of here. Come on!
translation.it: Ehi, fatemi uscire di qui! Andiamo!

translation.en: [doctor] He's been through a lot, but before we talk about Sam,
translation.it: Ha sofferto molto, ma prima di parlare di Sam, penso che dovremmo parlare di questo…

translation.en: I think we should talk about this…
translation.it: penso che dovremmo parlare di questo…

translation.en: He collapsed after getting you here. They're gonna want to talk to him when he wakes up.
translation.it: È svenuto dopo avervi portati qui. Gli parleranno quando si riavrà.

translation.en: [doctor] He got you through the checkpoint.
translation.it: Vi ha fatto superare il posto di blocco

translation.en: Caused quite a fuss with the soldiers.
translation.it: causando un bel trambusto tra i soldati.

translation.en: But when they saw you were midway through delivery and unconscious,
translation.it: Ma quando hanno visto che stavi per partorire ed eri svenuta, ti abbiamo portata qui e fatto un cesareo.

translation.en: we got you in here and performed a C-section.
translation.it: ed eri svenuta, ti abbiamo portata qui e fatto un cesareo.

translation.en: [doctor] It's a nice change having some life here.
translation.it: Un bel cambiamento, avere un po' di vita qui.

translation.en: Some base personnel are gonna be coming by to ask a few questions, security related.
translation.it: Verrà del personale della base per farvi qualche domanda sulla sicurezza.

translation.en: I told them that you need your rest, but they just need to clear some things up.
translation.it: Sanno che devi riposare, ma devono sapere alcune cose.

translation.en: The base nurse should be in here.
Yeah. Let's go say hi to Daddy.
Come here. Give me your little hand.
You wanna say hi to Daddy?
I think we can all agree
my plan to get us here was a stunning success.
translation.it: il mio piano per arrivare qui è stato un successo.

translation.en: You haven't even seen the worst part yet, G.
translation.it: Non hai visto la parte peggiore, G.

translation.en: Okay, there's really not a funny way to tell you this, but…
translation.it: Ok, non c'è un modo divertente per dirlo, ma…

translation.en: Why'd they do this to you?
It was the best they could do.
They said we'd know in a few days if I'm gonna be okay, but I just got to take it easy for now.
translation.it: Tra qualche giorno sapremo se starò bene, ma per ora devo andarci piano.

translation.en: But soon as we get to Korea,
translation.it: Ma non appena arriveremo in Corea,

translation.en: I'm for sure getting some of those robot feet.
translation.it: mi farò mettere dei piedi robotici.

translation.en: Because it's what dads are supposed to be.
translation.it: Perché è così che devono essere i papà.

translation.en: He feels like Forest to me.
And the guy who brought you here?
Arthur. I don't… I don't know his last name.
translation.it: Arthur. Non… Non conosco il suo cognome.

translation.en: -[soldier] So you came from? -[Georgia] Central Mass.
translation.it: Allora, venite da… Dal Massachusetts Centrale. Vicino al Quabbin.
Dal Massachusetts Centrale. Vicino al Quabbin.

translation.en: We, uh, we ended up making it to Philly before we looped back up.
translation.it: Siamo… eravamo arrivati a Filadelfia prima di dover tornare indietro.

translation.en: We were trying to get out of the country with the Family Initiative.
translation.it: Volevamo andarcene dal Paese con il Progetto Famiglie.

translation.en: We heard that they were still getting people out of Boston. Is that true?
translation.it: Dovrebbero far ancora uscire la gente da Boston. È vero?

translation.en: -Can I speak with you about-- -Oh, we're not done.
translation.it: - Posso parlare con lei di… - Non abbiamo ancora finito.

translation.en: -Okay. -So how'd you meet the guy, Arthur?
translation.it: - Ok. - Come ha conosciuto quel tizio, Arthur?

translation.en: Well, I guess I'll start with the--
We had to get across the no-man's-land.
translation.it: Dovevamo attraversare la terra di nessuno

translation.en: And we didn't wanna risk giving birth there.
translation.it: e non volevamo rischiare di partorire lì.

translation.en: So we found this dirt bike, and we decided to use that to get across,
translation.it: Abbiamo trovato una moto da cross e abbiamo deciso di usarla per il viaggio,

translation.en: and we only got halfway before we ran into some androids.
translation.it: ma eravamo solo a metà strada e ci siamo imbattuti in alcuni androidi.

translation.en: I hid, but they… they took Sam.
translation.it: Io mi sono nascosta, ma hanno preso Sam.

translation.en: They held him prisoner. They had a… a house full of prisoners.
translation.it: L'hanno tenuto prigioniero. Avevano una casa piena di prigionieri.

translation.en: So how'd you meet this guy, Arthur?
He was in the woods when it happened. He…
translation.it: Era nel bosco quando è successo.

translation.en: He took me back to his truck. And he…
translation.it: Mi ha portata al suo furgone e…

translation.en: Well, he helped me figure out a way to get Sam out of the house, and so I…
translation.it: Beh, mi ha aiutata a trovare un modo per far uscire Sam da quella casa. Quindi,

translation.en: I went in, and I got him.
I mean, you probably saw it on the truck already. But he…
translation.it: L'avrà già visto sul furgone, ma…

translation.en: Uh, he used to work at… Raster Robotics.
um, a programmer, and he built this…
translation.it: Era un programmatore e ha costruito questa,

translation.en: It makes you invisible to them.
You put it on, and it makes you invisible to the androids.
translation.it: Lo indossi e ti rende invisibile agli androidi.

translation.en: He told you it makes you invisible?

translation.it: Non me l'ha detto e basta.

translation.en: I went in, and I… and I went into the house, and I wore it…
translation.it: Sono entrata in quella casa indossando quel giubbotto e…

translation.en: You just walked into the house, and they couldn't see you?
translation.it: È entrata nella casa e non l'hanno vista?

translation.en: I'm telling you that it does because I wore it, and it worked.
translation.it: Esiste. L'ho messo e ha funzionato.

translation.en: And I'm telling you if that existed, don't you think we'd be using it?
translation.it: Se esistesse, non pensa che la useremmo?

translation.en: So you need to start straightening this story out so it starts making sense.
translation.it: Deve rivedere questa storia e darle un senso.

translation.en: [Arthur] Human beings are programmed to have emotional connections.
translation.it: Gli esseri umani sono programmati per avere legami affettivi.

translation.en: [sobbing] They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.it: Non hanno spirito di autoconservazione e sacrificano se stessi

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.it: e gli altri per avvicinarsi al loro obiettivo.

translation.en: [distorted] They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
I think I made a mistake.
Sam, get up! Sam, get up!
Come on. Sam! You gotta wake up.
I'm gonna come back. I promise.
-[soldier 1] Go, go, go, go! -[soldier 2] Breach! Breach!
It's okay. Don't cry. Be quiet. Mama's here.

translation.it: Mamma è qui. Ti prego, fai silenzio.

translation.en: What are you gonna do with that?
[voice breaking] They're all dead. They're all dead.
[sobs] They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead.
We were programmed to be emotive to make you feel comfort.
translation.it: Siamo programmati con l'emotività che vi rasserena.

translation.en: Boston's going down today. You can't stop us now.
translation.it: Boston verrà distrutta oggi. Non potete fermarci ormai.

translation.en: So, are you gonna disable that EMP for me?
Or you going to make me kill your baby?
-[woman speaking Korean] -[Georgia] Over here! Wait! -Wait. Here! -[gate rattling]
[woman] He's going to scan you. Do not move.
translation.it: Vi farà la scansione. Non muovetevi.

translation.en: I… I don't know what paperwork you might need or…
translation.it: Non so che documenti servano o…

translation.en: We don't… we don't have anything, but I just--
[Georgia] I… I know that you only take the mothers.
translation.it: So che prendete solo le madri.

translation.en: I can only take the baby.
Korea will only take the baby. Not the parents.
translation.it: La Corea prende solo i bambini, non i genitori.

translation.en: You can take us. It's only three of us.
I… I promise I will do anything.

translation.it: - La prego, ci prenda. - Mi dispiace.

translation.en: -Please take us. -[woman] It's not just the space.
translation.it: - La prego, ci prenda. - Mi dispiace. Non è solo per lo spazio. Siete altre bocche da sfamare.
Non è solo per lo spazio. Siete altre bocche da sfamare.

translation.en: Another person to take care for medical attention.
translation.it: Altre persone di cui occuparsi a cui servirebbero cure mediche.

translation.en: When you get to Korea, you will need a job. You will need a house. You see?
translation.it: Una volta in Corea, vi servirà un lavoro. Vi servirà una casa. Capisce?

translation.en: I'm gonna make it work. I'm gonna get us on the plane. I'm gonna get us on the boat, I promise.
translation.it: Troverò una soluzione. Troverò un volo. O una barca, te lo prometto.

translation.en: I don't think I'm gonna pull through this, G.
translation.it: Non credo che ce la farò, G.

translation.en: -We'll be fine. -Just listen. Just listen to me.
there's a good chance he'll die.
there's a good chance he'll live.
Look at me, G. I'm fucked.
I don't think I'm fully pulling through this.
And you can't really protect him. Not really.
translation.it: E tu non puoi proteggere lui. Non puoi.

translation.en: This could be a good thing.
Can I just have one minute? Just one minute, please. Just…
translation.it: Posso avere un minuto? Solo un minuto, per favore, solo…

translation.en: I didn't want any of this for you.
I would have done anything to give you a normal life.
translation.it: Avrei fatto di tutto per darti una vita normale.

translation.en: You would have gone to school in the city that you were born
translation.it: Saresti andato a scuola nella tua città

translation.en: and come home and told us about your day.
translation.it: e poi ci avresti raccontato la tua giornata.

translation.en: [Georgia] We would have taken summers on the shore.
translation.it: Avremmo passato le estati al mare.

translation.en: And that's where some of the most intense memories of childhood would have been.
translation.it: Là avremmo avuto i ricordi più intensi della tua infanzia.

translation.en: [Georgia] Your father would have read to you in silly voices.
translation.it: Papà ti avrebbe letto dei libri con buffe vocine

translation.en: You would go to sleep dreaming of the adventures
translation.it: e ti saresti addormentato sognando avventure

translation.en: you would have with your friends in the woods.
translation.it: con i tuoi amici nel bosco.

translation.en: [Georgia] In the perfect world, none of this would have happened.
translation.it: In un mondo perfetto, niente di tutto questo sarebbe successo.

translation.en: [Georgia] We would have worked to be the best parents we could have been.
translation.it: Avremmo fatto del nostro meglio come genitori.

translation.en: We would have been a family,
and the world wouldn't be falling apart.
translation.it: E il mondo non starebbe crollando.

translation.en: But I can't give you that.
I can't give you any of it.
I'm going to give you the only thing that I have left.
translation.it: ti darò l'unica cosa che mi è rimasta.

translation.en: A chance at a normal life,
with a new family in a new place.
translation.it: con una nuova famiglia, in un posto nuovo.

translation.en: [Georgia] I need you to know that I love you.
I need you to know that I wanted you.
God, I wanted you in my life. I…
translation.it: Dio, come ti avrei voluto con me.

translation.en: I wanted you by my side.
translation.it: Ti avrei voluto accanto a me.
- Ma non ho potuto… - È ora.

translation.en: Please let me finish this. I'm almost done. If you just--
translation.it: La prego, mi lasci finire. Ho quasi finito…

translation.en: Please find someone who will take care of him.
-He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
-He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay. He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay. [Sam] He's gonna be okay.
They're setting up a new base there. We're bringing whoever we can find. Do you wanna come with us?
translation.it: Allestiscono una nuova base. Portiamo chiunque troviamo. Vuole venire?
